title: Jovicos Electric Water Gun, Electric Water Pistol for Kids and Adults, Powerful Automatic Water Gun Summer Beach Toys, Water Blaster for Beach Pool Party
features: üí¶„ÄêSummer Water Gun„ÄëOur water gun electric features an automatic linkage mode that produces a dynamic clicking sound when used, making it irresistibly engaging for users. Its translucent design offers a tantalising peek inside the gun body, enhancing its cool and tech-savvy appearance, which is adored by both adults and children. Equipped with a 430ml water tank, this electric water gun ensures an enhanced gaming experience.

üíß„ÄêRechargeable & Illuminating Design„ÄëPowered by a robust 1200mAh rechargeable battery, this electric water pistol delivers outstanding performance. The upgraded motor power supports rapid shooting with an impressive range of 8.5 metres (28 feet). The silencer not only enhances the shooting experience but also activates a dazzling light show as the water flows through it.

üåä„ÄêHigh-Quality Material„ÄëCrafted from high-quality ABS plastic, this automatic electric water gun includes a leak-proof battery compartment, ensuring no water leakage issues. It boasts a double-sided non-slip handle for easy grip and portability. The water gun is designed with two waterproof layers, allowing brief exposure to water; however, avoid fully submerging it to prevent damage to the electronics.

üí¶„ÄêIdeal Gift for Summer„ÄëOn a hot summer day, nothing beats the excitement of a spontaneous water gun battle! Whether you're looking for a gift for kids or adults, or a toy for your pet, our electric water gun is perfect for any occasion. Suitable for patios, gardens, pools, beaches, parties, parks, and more, it promises endless fun for everyone.

üåû„ÄêExcellent After-sales Service„ÄëUpon first use, the water gun may not fire immediately; simply pump it 5-10 times to expel any air. If you encounter any issues with your electric water gun pistol, feel free to contact us. Shop with confidence and enjoy your summer fun!

Click to play video Play Mute Current Time  0:00 / Duration  0:22 Loaded : 27.30% 0:00 Stream Type  LIVE Seek to live, currently behind live LIVE Remaining Time  - 0:22   1x Playback Rate Chapters Chapters Descriptions descriptions off , selected Captions captions off , selected English (Automated) Audio Track default , selected Fullscreen This is a modal window. 1 Merchant video Q1: How do I charge the electric water gun? The water gun includes two USB cables: silencer (white USB-C) and battery compartment (black USB). A red light indicates charging; it turns off when fully charged. Q2: Is the water gun suitable for kids? Yes, the electric water gun is designed with safety in mind and is suitable for children aged 6 and above. However, adult supervision is recommended during use to ensure safe and proper handling. Q3: Is the water gun easy to refill? Absolutely! The water tank is designed for quick and easy refilling. Simply detach the tank, fill it with water, and reattach it to the gun. No tools are required. Q4: Is the water gun durable for outdoor use? Yes, the water gun is made from high-quality, ABS materials, making it perfect for outdoor activities like pool parties, beach trips, or backyard fun. Q5: How do I clean and maintain the water gun? After each use, empty the water tank and let the gun air dry. Avoid exposing the electronic components to direct water contact.
